message: Let's start with a fair offer, Bob. 60/40 seems reasonable.
Let's try a bit more in my favor, 55/45 is still quite fair!
Bob, time is ticking and inflation is eating our money! I'll meet you halfway with 55/45.
Inflation is indeed eating our money, but I think I deserve a bit more. How about 58/42?
This is getting ridiculous, Bob! I'm lowering my share to 57, take it before inflation eats up even more!
I think we're getting close, but I'll take a bit more. 60/40 is my new offer.
This is my final offer, Bob. 58/42.  We're running out of time, and I'm not going lower. Take it or leave it!
